title: Leather Ponytail Holder for Motorcycles, Handmade Leather Ponytail Hair Cuff, Ponytail Wrap Hair Glove for Women with Long Hair (3PCS)
features: ✔【Leather Hair Cuff】If You Love Wearing Your Hair in a Ponytail, This is the Accessory for You! It’s a Unique Hair Tie That Snaps Together to Protect a Little or a Lot of Your Hair. Imagine Wearing a Single for Jogging or Wrapping Your Whole Ponytail for a Breezy Motorcycle Ride!
✔【Hidden Hair Band】With the chic Leather Hair Cuff! Snaps around your hair to fit any size bun or ponytail. Features a hidden hair band to provide a strong hold.
✔【Flexible Design】Provides security and comfort for sports, motorcycling, horseback riding, and windy days. Fits any size bun or ponytail.Doubles as a stylish leather wrist cuff.
✔【Soft & Breathable 】No more helmet hair! Soft leather provides easy head movement while providing maximum protection for all types of hair.
✔【SUITABLE ALL TYPES】It works best in thin to medium thick hair. It may not close around really thick hair. Work on all hair types. For women and girls of all ages.
